enWisdom: Knowledge makes one lofty, ignorance misguides
Knowledge is a veil [that protects one] from adversities
Knowledge is one of the two lives

Wisdom: الْعِلْمُ مُحْيِي النَّفْسِ وَمُنِيرُ الْعَقْلِ وَمُمِيتُ الْجَهْلِ
enWisdom: Knowledge is the enlivener of the soul, the illuminator of the intellect and the annihilator of ignorance
Draw water from the clear spring which has been cleansed of all impurity
Through knowledge, the crooked is straightened
